svg.title: Honeycomb lattice - hexagonal lattice with a two-atom basis

cc:Work.dc:title: Honeycomb lattice - hexagonal lattice with a two-atom basis
cc:Work.dc:description: Honeycomb lattice is not a Bravais lattice, but can be considered a hexagonal lattice with a two-atom basis (atoms A and B). Vectors a₁ and a₂ are primitive translation vectors. The gray rhombus is a primitive cell.
